00038 #define DeclareSingletonClass(_SingletonClass) \
00039 private: \
00040     static _SingletonClass* singleton; \
00041 public: \
00042     static _SingletonClass* CreateSingleton(); \
00043     static void DestroySingleton(); \
00044     static inline _SingletonClass* GetSingleton() { return singleton; } \

00046 
00049 #define ImplementSingletonClass(_SingletonClass) \
00050     _SingletonClass* _SingletonClass::CreateSingleton() { \
00051         FUAssert(singleton == NULL, return singleton); \
00052         return singleton = new _SingletonClass(); } \
00053     void _SingletonClass::DestroySingleton() { \
00054         FUAssert(singleton != NULL, return); \
00055         SAFE_DELETE(singleton); } \
00056     _SingletonClass* _SingletonClass::singleton = NULL

00058 #endif // _FU_SINGLETON_H_
